questiontext.text:
Find the eigenvalues and the associated eigenvectors of the following matrix:

$$\small A = \begin{pmatrix}-5 &-5 \\-6 &-5\end{pmatrix}\:$$

[Calculate upto 2 significant]

$$\small \lambda_{1} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=-10.4772:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}  $$\small \lambda_{2} = $${1:NUMERICAL:=0.47723:0#Good job!!~*#Incorrect, try again}
